short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: PIPELINE Wallet, manage and store your Bitcoin assets easily. Support the PIPE protocol.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It also features capabilities to detect and protect Ordinals and BRC-20 assets, but does not yet offer protection for Runes and other UTXO protocol assets.
